content: Given the ingredients of 4 cups of oat flour, 2 cups of almond milk, and 1 cup of blueberries, each muffin requiring 1/2 cup of oat flour, 1/4 cup of almond milk, and 1/8 cup of blueberries, what is the maximum number of vegan breakfast muffins that can be made? Can you also calculate the amount of excess ingredients remaining after making the maximum number of muffins? Please provide the JavaScript code to compute the result.
